In November we are opening up Past Life Regression sessions in person or through Zoom. You will be guided on your journey by an IACT-Certified Hypnotherapist with a special focus on Past Life Regression. Email HealingEarthSouls@gmail.com or HealingEarthIntentions@gmail.com to join the waitlist! Products for Meditation and Manifestation We make hand poured candles, bath products, and oils to assist you in your spiritual journey. Calm your mind, raise your vibrations, heal yourself and your world. Natural Home Fragrance Our 100% Soy Candles and Reed Diffusers are eco friendly and safe. We use essential oils and fragrances that are non toxic and safe for your kids and pets.
